Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: stvlai "Steven"
Reviews.Content: Saw my friend have one of this oCosmo TV and he seems pleased with the TV for the price that he paid at Amazon.com. Well, I ended buying 3 of them for the kids & guest rooms. Setup seems to be quite easy and accessories was complete. As with all new electronic equipment, figuring out the new remote is always a bit of challenge but my 2 younger kids seems no problem hooking up to their XBox. The Remote is convenient as it controls the TV as well as the DVD player. The built-in DVD player as it save some counter space.The TV also comes with a Screwdriver to attach the TV Stand to the TV. That was convenient. The sound is just ok but I plan to hook up a External SoundBar to the TV. The color is not bad at all and there is different settings for the color according to your liking. Well so far so good and hope the TV will be around for some time.

Reviews.Title: Ocosmo 32" tv's
Reviews.Author: aces600 "Alexander Morales"
Reviews.Content: ok so i was a bit worried on these, they where really priced low when i got them and i bought 3 for the kids room because of the built in dvds. gotta tell you they look great and work as described. i mounted them on the wall and havent had any problems with the tv or dvd player. use the sony codes when programming a cable or satellite controller. very pleased with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Paul Thomann
Reviews.Content: I bought this LED TV for our new RV 5th wheeler and I love it.  The color is perfect, great picture and it has all of the features I needed with a built-in DVD player to save us additional space.  All of this for a price $200 below what comparable televisions would cost.  While I had never heard of the brand before and was skeptical, I can safely say I will buy more of these in the future.  They are well built and so far, this TV works flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Better than advertised
Reviews.Author: Dennis Barnes
Reviews.Content: This is a fairly new company, the quality is excellent even down to the packaging and manual. They even included a quality Phillips screwdriver to assemble the stand. I would buy another of their products, they stand up to any other better known manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: lifesabeach
Reviews.Content: Easy to hook up, nice color, many features.  Awesome deal.  Built in DVD is really nice.  I would recommend for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: adriana
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my purchase.It is easy to use, hooked antenna and able to watch various channels.The built in dvd player saves space and no extra messy wiring to do.Easy for my grandma to use.I do recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: great buy for the money
Reviews.Author: venita morgan
Reviews.Content: it is probably the best flat screen we have in our 6 tvs it has the best picture and I would buy another one if I needed another one would highly recommend to everyone

Reviews.Title: Dont let name & price fool you!
Reviews.Author: Luz Zent
Reviews.Content: This TV looks and works great.  And has DVD port too for this price is insane...Try and beat this size with extra feature!  You cant!

Reviews.Title: Beware! oCOSMO 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV with Built-in DVD Player
Reviews.Author: D. E. PATTON
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because of the reviews. When I received it, the quality wasn’t the best, but for the price, I thought I would try it out anyway. After two months, I moved the TV to another room. When I tried to watch it, the inner screen was cracked. I should’ve known that it was very fragile because of the poor quality. I called Sceptre, the maker of the TV, and they told me that the warranty does not cover cracked screens regardless of it being internal. At the time, the TV was $224. All I can say is that I wasted $224. I would not recommend this TV or any other TV made by the maker. If you decide to purchase this or any other product made by them, I wish you the best.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Great price and great picture. Dvd player is a plus for the kids room! Even came with a screw driver to put together and a screen cleaner cloth. Wish I had bought two of these tv's.

Reviews.Title: What a delightful surprise!
Reviews.Author: Rikki B. Schwartz "zookeeper"
Reviews.Content: "OCOSMO"??  Under 200 bucks for an LEDTV with DVD???  Not LCD, but LED??!! No way!  I almost asked the UPS driver to wait, cuz I figured it would go right back.  But don't let the price or off-brand scare you off!  Picture is beautiful.  Sound is clear.  Set-up is easy. Manual is clear.  DVD works great.  I've only had it a day...but so far so good!  I'll update this review if anything changes.  For now...highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Ocosmo TV
Reviews.Author: Blue Water
Reviews.Content: This TV is a very good TV for the money. It was easy to set up and use. I really enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Really like it!!!
Reviews.Author: T. Rex
Reviews.Content: All the positive reviews on this television were correct.  We were very pleased with the picture quality and the price was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Can't hear
Reviews.Author: ken franklin
Reviews.Content: This TV has a good picture but needs better speakers. I have to turn up to 80 too hear. I have it out on my patio.

Reviews.Title: Good picture and dvd player.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth West
Reviews.Content: Had it couple of weeks, mounted it on the wall and it's good TV for the bedroom. Really nice to have the built in DVD player. Anyway, nothing bad at all to say about it and for the price it's great. Thinking about getting another one for the game room.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful tv
Reviews.Author: nnjcustomer
Reviews.Content: It's been set-up for 2 days now and it's a great tv. Good price and great picture, well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV bad instructions
Reviews.Author: Qtmeemz
Reviews.Content: I love this TV it has a DVD player, it's clear, huge, just about perfect! Only thing I have to critique is the fact that I had to buy a converter in order to plug it in which I had no clue I had to do. Also the instructions manual isn't very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Good Value!
Reviews.Author: Robert Costello
Reviews.Content: Needed an inexpensive TV with built-in DVD quickly, as my last one (a Magnavox) gave up the DVD ghost after 3 years. This is not a super-duper TV, but it serves its purpose. For $260, I got both the TV w/DVD and the sound bar (and free 2 day shipping), so I believe I rec'd good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good TV with amazing low price
Reviews.Author: Sky
Reviews.Content: Love the TV, good picture quality and the reason why I choose this one, because of integrated DVD player, so I can use it at my store to play advertising slide show.

Reviews.Title: great for the price! bad delivery
Reviews.Author: kates1937
Reviews.Content: We haven't used this too much yet, but so far, so good! It looks really nice and sounds good. It wasn't difficult to set up. Great for the price.On a side note, UPS left this on our front walkway, and we live in the city and have a big porch it could have been tucked away on. Thankfully, our neighbors saw it just sitting out in the front yard (and not under anything- thankfully it didn't rain) and picked it up. Come on, you can't even walk it up 3 staris to put it on the porch?

Reviews.Title: Very nice but....
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: Pros: nice picture quality, tv is very lite, easy menu, easy setup, audio equalizer works good, DVD picture quality is goodCons: DVD input has to be selected prior to inserting DVD, sound is a little can like (tinny) so needs custome equalizer setting, volume at 1 low setting is not low enough (opposite of orher reviews), oCosmo logo at startup is VERY annoying - would like to turn if off like Sony lets you do.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV. Instruction weak.
Reviews.Author: TG
Reviews.Content: The tv is as expected. However the directions leave much to be desired. The issues I had are related to installing the stand. Poor identification of bolts, which could increase chance of stripping base. Just be careful to check twice before deciding on which bolts to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv/ dvd
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Isbell "Isbell1s"
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend, great picture and easy to operate, you must have it on dvd though for the dvd to go in.

Reviews.Title: oCosmo tv is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Paula Jackson
Reviews.Content: I ordered from Amazon on Wed. and received it Fri.  The picturee is great and dvd works wonderfully!  If you have Directv, you must set up on SONY settings!

Reviews.Title: Just Okay
Reviews.Author: Diane Greger
Reviews.Content: The size was perfect for my bedroom.  I didn't expect quality with a name I never heard of - so my standard for the picture low and the picture was not bad, but the sound was terrible.  It sounded like the speakers on my outdated computer!  The TV gets three stars, but Amazon gets 10 stars for their return policy.  The best experience.  I love Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Super Nice
Reviews.Author: Annbeth
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for an inexpensive TV for a guest room , decided to take a chance on this, although I was not familiar with the brand. This by far is the best purchase I have made all year. The TV looks great, the picture is crisp & clear; the set up,  from out of the box, to kicking back to watch a show, took only a few minutes.  The DVD player is icing on the cake and will make it really nice for my guests. In fact I like this set so much, the guest room is now my new TV room.

Reviews.Title: So far working great!
Reviews.Author: John Kinnane
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom to simply her old DVD/TV setup so that they'd be all in one.  The DVD part is easy to use, eliminates separate cables to hook up and separate remotes.  The picture quality seems pretty good, better than the $220 Westinghouse model I bought for my own bedroom a while back and is about the same price with a DVD player.  So for the price this seems like a good TV on its own and the DVD player is a bonus!

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the kids room!
Reviews.Author: Janet P. Tetzloff "jpt0821"
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our grandchildren for Christmas.  The built-in DVD player works great and the picture and sound are very high quality.  Even our two year old grandson can insert and eject his own DVDs.

Reviews.Title: STILL WORKS
Reviews.Author: Emil E.
Reviews.Content: For someone looking for a cheap TV which does just what its supposed to do,thumbs up to this one.Simple,cheap and to the point.No abracadabra here.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly awesome
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: Got this TV expecting it to break within the first couple months but it has actually been amazing.  Use it for a workout room where I could put workout DVDs in and not take up alot of space.  Picture is not the most clear compared to other TVs but for the price it serves its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Eon
Reviews.Content: Wow, for the price I paid for this: totally worth it. The picture is awesome and I can hook up any game system I want. The loudest volume i can reach isn't actually that loud but that doesn't bother me. Also, the built-in DVD player sounds like it's rusted and takes a bit to take the dvd in, other than that, i have no regrets

Reviews.Title: great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: lms
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv as a christmas gift.  It has worked great and we have not had any problems out of it.  It came in a timely matter and was in great shape.  The built in dvd player is also very nice, you don't have to hook up any other machines to your TV

Reviews.Title: A great T.V
Reviews.Author: Cameron J Lewis
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be more happy Just a Few Minutes to set up out of the box, and has great picture and color. The DVD player works great as well, This is the first T.V I've bought with built in player that works as it should. Have had about 6 months now and no issues. I feel confident recommending this and have already done so to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Gretel
Reviews.Content: Works great and my son loves it in his room. Great picture and no issues setting up. Great extra TV.

Reviews.Title: tv was not very good it had so many things wrong with it
Reviews.Author: Rebekah
Reviews.Content: this tv was not a 32inch it was a 27inch and it had a scarch on screen when delivered and know I cant return it

Reviews.Title: My TV
Reviews.Author: MIMS
Reviews.Content: I like my TV and the built in dvd player but they said it was new in the box & I noticed there was a dent in the back, I had already threw out the box and set it up so decided it was too much trouble to return for just a dent. Other than that, It works fine.

Reviews.Title: got for my grandson
Reviews.Author: E. Landi "shoppergirl"
Reviews.Content: Perfectly priced tv as a present for my grandson :) even better it has a built in DVD player. Great sound and picture for the price ..

Reviews.Title: A FINE TV
Reviews.Author: DENNIS SCHEFFEY
Reviews.Content: Good TV DVD Good Quality and my daughter likes that the DVD feeder is on the side.. I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Okay Picture, Bad Sound
Reviews.Author: Stacy Geske
Reviews.Content: The picture is decent. There is a spot that is greenish and can be noticeable if there is a lighter image on the screen. The sound is not good. Anything aside from quiet music or talking sounds terrible.

Reviews.Title: DVD constantly get stuck
Reviews.Author: Jay Kash "tech head"
Reviews.Content: When it doesn't attempt to eat a dvd it works well. Otherwise, I spend an afternoon trying to get the eject motor to spit the dvd back out without prying and ruining a dvd, which I've had to do once. Not worth the money for the effort to fix poor quality.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: hlnewton
Reviews.Content: This arrived undamaged and although it was a gift for my daughter for Christmas, she's not gotten full use of it yet. We're in process of redoing her bedroom so it's not in use 100% of time yet. It has worked great so far tho. I must add she'd have been happier with a BluRay DVD player but that wasn't an option. Otherwise works great so far.

Reviews.Title: DVD Player Problems in Less Than A Year
Reviews.Author: D. Hill
Reviews.Content: After only six months, the DVD player is now cycling on and off in the middle of playing DVD's.  Occasionally, it will cycle 8 or 9 times during a single DVD.  Made in China.......I am not that surprised.

Reviews.Title: Good Customer Support
Reviews.Author: Bob Stone
Reviews.Content: Had a problem initially with the remote. Customer support is through Spectre.  Great service. Talked me through diagnostics and then replaced the remote easily. Aside from minor glitch everything works great and they did the right thing.

Reviews.Title: sound is not stable
Reviews.Author: K. Postell "ILoveToys"
Reviews.Content: When I try to watch this tv on a local channel I have to turn the sound up to a hundred per cent and it is still hard to hear, most other channels work at about 70%

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality had to return after one month
Reviews.Author: L. Cormier
Reviews.Content: I had it one month and needed to return it as it had no picture, and ruined three DVD's. My advice, don't buy a refurbished TV/DVD Combo.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sandra Curtis
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived in perfect time. I have it mounted in my office. It shows a beautiful, clear picture I could not be happier with it.  The picture is much better than another TV I have costing 2x's as much

Reviews.Title: Fantastic T.V.
Reviews.Author: Amber C
Reviews.Content: This T.V. has such a great set up. Everything is clearly labeled so I know exactly where to plug in my cords for my xbox console and the built in dvd player is so smooth. It plays all my old dvd's without skipping or scratching them. I highly recommend this T.V. to any big time gamer it will workout out great for you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LED TV!!
Reviews.Author: KRISSY M KERN
Reviews.Content: I bought this LED TV for my daughter and she LOVES it! It has a great picture and the built in DVD player is an added bonus. I love LED and LCD TV's as their pictures are so clear and crisp, no need to even adjust the color or picture. We had no trouble at all hooking it up, it was very easy instructions! The 32 inch is perfect for my daughter's room as it doesn't take up much room and it will be even more perfect for her Dorm. I recommend this TV very highly!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my daughters room!
Reviews.Author: Amber Farnan
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my daughters room and we love it. Great Price - free shipping - it saved so much time, we didn't have to stand in line on black friday!

Reviews.Title: Great Second TV and DVD
Reviews.Author: MrMeanGene
Reviews.Content: Its not the highest quality set but for a bedroom tv that doesn't get the use of the main tv, it has worked well and the picture is good too. DVD is easy enough to work and remote also. There is something loose in the remote though, but all the functions work just fine for the time being. If I can get more than a year or two out of it, then it was money well spent.

Reviews.Title: very nice TV
Reviews.Author: i just bought it but itwont even work
Reviews.Content: I have been watching DVDs like crazy because I'm still trying to figure out how to do everything else. But I'm really impressed with this TV. I love the size and how nice it looks.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: shahram
Reviews.Content: I have never heard of this TV I was hezitant first but i bought it and i am so impressed how excellent this product is the sharpness of the picture and easy to use the remote is excellet

Reviews.Title: Had problems with the tv
Reviews.Author: Johnnie Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I gave this tv as a gift for Christmas. Mydaughter used it a few days and a movie got stuck inside the dvd player.Didn't have a good experience when calling for help

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: There is really nothing more to say. I set it up (very easy to do). I turned it on (also easy). I watched (easiest). It is clear and works great. Everybody in my house loves it. Tank you.

Reviews.Title: the cosmo tv
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Srong "book lover"
Reviews.Content: It is sharp in picture, slim line which is very nice, and the color on the screen is marvelous. easy to  set up and operate.

Reviews.Title: Great price on TV
Reviews.Author: BobL
Reviews.Content: It's perfect for the bedroom. We mounted it on the wall and it works great. Can't wait to use the DVD player.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a wall where space is at a premium
Reviews.Author: Gregory B. Chiartas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife who is a certified Yoga Instructor. She uses this one of her smaller studio rooms. It fit nicely on the wall and took up no for space so she can show DVD's without having something on the floor to hold the DVD player or a shelf sticking out of the wall. Works great and has a very nice picture!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: kasey
Reviews.Content: We got this for my daughter (10) for her room and we are very pleased.  Great size, easy to use. Clear picture. Worth the money

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Tina Van Klaveren
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these TVs for Christmas for my kids, the picture is excellent. Everything works great, the only thing is my DirecTV remote won't work with it. Still would recommend.

Reviews.Title: TV w/ DVD player
Reviews.Author: Judy B
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift for my son and he loves it. The built in DVD player is a great bonus!

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: mona
Reviews.Content: Got this 32" because my 19" Samsung's screen was just too small to watch from across the bedroom.  Ok for the price but some annoying "features" which, although they do not irritate me enough to return it, if I had known about them beforehand I would not have bought it.1. Audio volume calibrated too high - even the very lowest volume setting before silence is too loud - at the lowest setting I can still hear the tv from other rooms.  I tried every combination of audio settings available but lowest setting is still too loud.  So I finally hooked up my computer speakers for better control of low volume.2.  There are several pre-set video schemes with different combinations of brightness/contrast/color etc.  However the differences between the schemes is so small as to make them useless, and you are not allowed to edit them.  You are only allowed to edit the one "user" scheme.  Similar complaint for the pre-set audio schemes.3.  "ocosmo" logo splash screen every time you turn it on4.  Although there is a sleep timer, there are apparently no program timers.  You can't set it to wake up and play a chosen channel for a specified amount of time or automatically switch to another channel at a certain time.  The Samsung has program timers and I miss being able to do this on the ocosmo.5.  There doesn't seem to be a way to manually add individual channels - you have to repeat the entire channel scan and then again go through re-marking which channels you want skipped and which to set as favorites.On the plus side, the picture looks good when displaying HD broadcasts and I haven't had any problems using the DVD player as other reviewers have.  It's good enough for a bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Good budget TV
Reviews.Author: Christopher Stapleton
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my wife for Christmas to replace the tiny tube tv that was in our bedroom.  The TV has good, not great, picture. It performs well, the DVD player works well but is a bit slow on eject and the fact you have to put the TV on DVD before you can insert the disk is difficult to get used to.  The remote feels cheap and has sharp corners.  overall, for the price I paid for it, I am satisfied with this TV.

Reviews.Title: TV quit working 2 hours out of the box
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: I really had high hopes for this tv, unfortunately those hopes were dashed when the TV would not display a picture when turned on the second time, two hours after set up. I am returning it today but still have to wait two weeks AFTER Amazon receives the item before I can get a refund. Waist of my time and money.

Reviews.Title: Its a TV with a dvd player
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: The quality is just as you would expect from an off brand TV it looks sleek and has the convenience of a dvd player built into it. It would have been nicer if it had a Blu-ray player but I bought It for my mom who only ever buys regular dvds anyway. The dvd player works perfectly. The only downside is it seems a little bulky for an LED TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, volume issue
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Hansen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV and I am happy with the DVD and the picture but the lowest volume setting is too high.  I could never put this in our bedroom because even if I put the volume at level 1 it would be too loud to watch while my husband is sleeping.  I thought it was just me but when my daughter came home from college and watched it in her room she said "Wow, this TV is loud even at the lowest setting."  So I guess it is not just me.  Has anyone else had problems with the volume being too loud?  The sound is good otherwise and the picture is great!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Craig
Reviews.Content: This lightweight flat screen with DVD player is great.  It is lightweight with a good picture and sound and mounts easily.  Nice for any bedroom or dorm.

Reviews.Title: This is a great tv-
Reviews.Author: hm
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture, just as clear from a side view as a front view.Sound is fine, no issues with that. Haven't tried the DVD in it yet.Remote works great, light-weight, easy to use. Shipped fast, packaged well

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO TV not up to the quality standard I expected
Reviews.Author: John Truttman
Reviews.Content: This TV has a poor picture. Also, out of the box the language was set up in French! It took me quite a while to figure out how to change it to English.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: jax
Reviews.Content: Good value for the cost. Some small issues with the remote. But if i needed anotherTV I would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Good for a Spare Room
Reviews.Author: Ms. Pageant
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice t.v. with a beautiful picture but does not have the best sound quality. The DVD player works just as described perfect t.v. for the  size and price for a spare room.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Richard ledoux
Reviews.Content: The 2 I purchased looked and functioned perfectly for my applicationI would recommend this product for future investmentsRichard Ledoux

Reviews.Title: Just the right size.
Reviews.Author: C. Cecala
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for use in my exercise room.  It has a sharp picture, and a DVD player. The built in DVD player is why I purchased it.  I 'm very satisfied with the quality of the TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: TV arrived on time and in good condition.  It has clear picture and DVD player works as advertised, I would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: hdtv
Reviews.Author: Patricia F. Joyner
Reviews.Content: convienent, easy for young children to use,takes up little space,looks good and overall,, especially price, a good buy,hope it lasts as long as the big name players

Reviews.Title: great Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Taylor mullis
Reviews.Content: Got it in only two days and my parents loved it ! I bought it for them for Christmas and they hooked it up and watched it right away

Reviews.Title: Wrong Remote
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: White everything else has worked out fine, the fact I was shipped a Sceptre brand remote instead of an oCosmo brand has made me rank this a 3 instead of a 4. This was a gift, and I would've liked it to work out perfectly straight out of the box.

Reviews.Title: TV okie dokie
Reviews.Author: Richard G Svihlik
Reviews.Content: Best price, at the time, built in DVD player is what sold me. Any time I can do away with another gizmo, ie free standing player, the better.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO TV is wonderful
Reviews.Author: Anthony Giamanco
Reviews.Content: The picture is crystal clear and the TV is easy to set up.  The built in DVD player works great and also gives a crystal clear picture.  The price was outstanding and I would say this was the bargain of the year.  It has more than enough ports to connect anything you want.  This TV is equal to or better than many name brands at double the price.

Reviews.Title: Love t.v
Reviews.Author: Rose Surprenant
Reviews.Content: This tv is what I expected  very happy , Very nice  picture ,easy to set up ,I put this tv in my cafe people love to watch the news as they have lunch.

Reviews.Title: Super TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: MyTymeBooks
Reviews.Content: This is my main TV in a tiny house and I don't feel overwhelmed by it.  Out of the box, set up and running in minutes.  Good color, clarity and sound.  No complaints here!  I am considering a smaller unit of the same brand for my bedroom.DVD worked the first try and easy to control.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Ruby
Reviews.Content: This TV/DVD combination saves a lot of space and is working well. The picture quality is satisfactory and the DVD controls are intuitive. Perfect for a guest bedroom or the home gym area.

Reviews.Title: 32-inch HDTV with Built-in DVD Player
Reviews.Author: Debra L. Mauldin "willowtree"
Reviews.Content: This item was purchases as a Christmas gift for my daughter.  She loves it and the convenience of the Built-in DVD Player.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V. for the money.
Reviews.Author: Duane Lambert "prescott"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use directions to set up T.V. and has a great picture .  The speakers sound good as well.

Reviews.Title: LED
Reviews.Author: Ruth
Reviews.Content: bought this LED  for my son's room.  he loves it.  installation was very easy.  he especially loves the built in DVD player.  Love love it!

Reviews.Title: Price match Product
Reviews.Author: Kezzzy
Reviews.Content: The product is great for the price and the picture shows clear. The only problem is that everytime you turn on the tv, " oCosmo " appears across the screen. The tv is light and if you have kids becareful as it can easily fall.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Tommy Clark
Reviews.Content: My daughter needed a new HDTV without all the bells n whistles and high cost.  This one is a great fit.  The convenience of having built-in DVD was good selling point as well.  Lets see how long it last!

Reviews.Title: Ocosmo 32-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: triluck
Reviews.Content: Very good picture quality for the price. I bought the matching sound bar because the audio like most low priced tv's was not good.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: H. Maxwell "Grampoo"
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for our 12 year old granddaughter. It is everything she needs in one! Great picture,good sound.Would recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Pooky73
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture. Bought two for xmas presents.  Easy to set up.  Hope the DVD player lasts long.  Great TV!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: carole
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with the quality of picture and sound at a wonderfully low price. Would recommend this tv to anyone that wants decent quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv for the Money
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: This Tv is perfect for a bedroom or kitchen.  Great buy.  The built in DVD is  great feature that eliminates any extra wires hanging on the wall.  I only have a few minor complaints....  The remote has a lot of buttons and they are close together without any separation for the different features, this can be a real pain to use in the dark.  maybe after a few months of use I will start to get used to it.  I backlit remote would make this problem nonexistent.  the only other thing I don't like is that you have to turn the tv into DVD mode to eject and load a dvd.  Neither of these are big problems for me just small annoyances that for the price of the tv I am willing to deal with.  So for with the limited time I have had this TV i would deffinatly recommended it to anyone looking for a secondary tv.  The lack of 1080 and lower sounds quality wouldn't make it ideal for a tv used to watch movies in my living room.

Reviews.Title: Happy Wife, Happy Life
Reviews.Author: Kevin M. Smith "KMS"
Reviews.Content: A perfect TV fopr my wife.  I'm blessed with a woman who has few requests.  She just wanted a reliable TV with a great screen.  This delivers!

Reviews.Title: BEST VALUE FOR A 32" TV
Reviews.Author: MichaelZ
Reviews.Content: Picture is dramatic, bright. Very good value. First LED television that I have ever owned. Great second TV, very light and portable.

Reviews.Title: I love this tv,good sound and picture, however limited inputs
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The set-up was easy but the number of inputs is limited. I need to get a HDMI cable.DVD works well,lightweight, rotating TV stand

Reviews.Title: works as advertised
Reviews.Author: E. Liu
Reviews.Content: Ours is installed in a bedroom to a non-HD signal. Good picture with the built-in DVD player. Sound quality is average but I didn't have high expectations to begin with. Overall great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Meredith Hollingsworth
Reviews.Content: This is the first flat screen TV I have ever owned so I don't know the difference but I like this TV a lot so far.  I will say that because it's a new brand RCN doesn't have it listed so configuring it to my cable was difficult and I still have to use the remote it came with to access the DVD but other than that everything is great..

Reviews.Title: perfect for kid's room or game room.
Reviews.Author: Amy T.
Reviews.Content: Its great tv at a good price.  Love the dvd player in the tv. Its save more room for other to add on.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Marty Schoocraft
Reviews.Content: Great TV especially with a DVD/CD player!!  Was for my aunt and she is super happy!!  And the price!  Wish I had bought one for me and sold one of my flat screens!!

Reviews.Title: Great tv for price
Reviews.Author: LALA
Reviews.Content: A great value for a TV with DVD. Easy set up to cable. Picture sharp and color good. Feel this new brand a winner and value.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Tv
Reviews.Author: Nicole Ellsworth
Reviews.Content: I brought this Flat screen for my bedroom. It arrived quick and was no hassel at all. DVD feature is very easy. Color quality is great. I would buy this TV again.

Reviews.Title: I have had this tv for 2 weeks...
Reviews.Author: Jason Rose
Reviews.Content: and it has been great so far.  The volume does not get as loud as I would like, but I solved the problem by hooking up some small speakers.  For the price, I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good picture and DVD combo TV
Reviews.Author: Dano
Reviews.Content: I replaced our smaller flat screen TV in our bedroom with this 32" TV/ DVD combo.The picture is good as the audio is better than the TV I replaced.I have not had the chance to use any of the HDMI inputs or the USB port yet.This makes a great TV for a bedroom, rec room or a college dorm.

Reviews.Title: COSMO  32 inch  TV
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Thompson
Reviews.Content: This TV is excellent  -- just perfect.  Beautiful picture and can play my DVD exercises or movies on it and it is awesome.Thank You.

Reviews.Title: Good Value Fast Delivery
Reviews.Author: H. Renert
Reviews.Content: Good  value for the money and particularly pleased with the amazon 30 day tech support, which was unexpected. Good use more instructions in manual.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it!
Reviews.Author: Hagenspiel
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tv for under $200 for what I would use it for, which is streaming and playing DVDs.  The fact that it came with a built in DVD player, was just a bonus.  I don't normally buy combos but this was a deal.  The quality of the picture also gives much more expensive TVs a run for the money.

Reviews.Title: 32 Inch Comos TV and DVD
Reviews.Author: Geo. V.
Reviews.Content: I was a bit surprised at the good color and picture quality. The DVD is good also..Pretty easy to set up. The Digtal stations come in automatically..no pushing a Ch. plus a dash...nice feature.geo v.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: teagirl
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is amazing I love that it has the built in dvd player I bought 3 of these to replace my kids big old box TV's and for the cyber Monday price of $199 you just couldn't beat that

Reviews.Title: Very surprisingly pleased!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Who's heard of oCOSMO?!?!  There were only a few reviews on this TV but they were mostly positive so with Amazon's amazing return policy, I figured I'd give it a shot.  I'm glad I did!!  I got this when it was $200 before Black Friday.  This TV is super light, even with the built-in DVD player.  I'm currently watching digital over-the-air TV with the built in digital tuner and it's got a very satisfactory picture.  The sound is what you would expect from a really light, inexpensive TV.  It sounded really small initially, but we got used to it quickly and it's more than adequate for the bedroom which we purchased it for.  I've only used the DVD player once so far (had it for two weeks), but it worked fine when I did.  Keep in mind that you have to set the source to DVD in order for the DVD to go in.  I didn't know this and thought it was broken at first; almost broke it myself by trying to force the disc in!  I docked this TV one star because there is a light green (or white) fading in the upper left corner.  It's only visible when it's black and doesn't affect the picture, but it shouldn't be there.  However, I liked this TV so much, I figured I'd write a review about it!  Unless you're a super audio or videophile, I think you'll be happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Christina Haney
Reviews.Content: TV for my kids room. love the tv/dvd player in 1. It looks so much neater.Picture is good too!

Reviews.Title: TV Purchase
Reviews.Author: Chester A. Cosby
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy for a 32" LED TV with a DVD player, the base was a little hard to assembly but all the material necessary where included with the shipment including the screw driver to assembly the unit.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a TV at a great price.  Shipping was as promised except we were not home to receive it so it was delivered the next day via FedEx.

Reviews.Title: ocosmo 32 inch led tv
Reviews.Author: sasha
Reviews.Content: The tv was an excellent buy. The tv was for a bedroom and the picture and sound could not have been better.

Reviews.Title: the good and the bad
Reviews.Author: Bobby B
Reviews.Content: It's super light, which is nice, and makes it easy to mount on the wall.  The picture is good, but as many other reviewers noted, the sound is sub-par.  It will meet my needs as a bedroom TV, and I love the built-in DVD, but due to the speaker issues, would not use as a family TV.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: William M. Floyd "Humble Artist , Inspired CEO"
Reviews.Content: The oCOSMO 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV with Built-in DVD Player (Glossy Black)  At the affordable price it meets my highest expectations!

Reviews.Title: JUNK DVD PLAYER
Reviews.Author: Joe Lee "Joe Lee"
Reviews.Content: The TV is fine but the attached DVD player is very problematic with much freezing up and failure to read some DVDs..even new ones. If I had it all to do over again, I would get the model without the DVD player attached and opt for a seperate unit.

Reviews.Title: Tv with DVD
Reviews.Author: stacy
Reviews.Content: The tv is great, but for some reason I can get my directv remote to link up....this brand is not listed with directv

Reviews.Title: Why does everyone complain about the sound? Ignore the reviews by people who are obviously hard of hearing
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: The picture isn't crystal clear, but for the peice, it is a steal. A lot of the comments mention bad sound, but I dont agree. This is my bedroom t.v. and since the room is very large I am situated very far away. From that far away the pixels look clearer and the sound works fine. I am so hapoy I bought it. Will only be sad if it gets cheaper for black friday. Easy setup, great quality, exceptional way to spend 200 bucks.

Reviews.Title: got cheap
Reviews.Author: gran marie
Reviews.Content: The price was great. It was so easy to set up and layperson instructions for the set up. I had never installed anything more than a coffee pot. The picture is good if you sit straight in front but color is very poor if you sit on the side.  The sound

Reviews.Title: Bought two to use around the church.
Reviews.Author: K. Gilmore
Reviews.Content: I needed two basic tv/dvd players that can be moved from class to class as needed and are not expensive.  The sound is not great for music but is relatively clear for speaking.  They are extremely lightweight and protable.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 32-inch HDTV with DVD player
Reviews.Author: NaNi Lynn
Reviews.Content: oCosmso TV was bought for my 90 year old mother.  She loves the "big" picture, but says the sound is a bit "tin-ny".  She hooked it up to her Bose surround sound system and is now a happy camper!

Reviews.Title: Digital confusion
Reviews.Author: Ann Lowe "Golfer1"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not great but is good value for money. Because some channels are still analog the index overlaps with the digital channels on the same number. For example. I have Brighthouse and the weather channel is on channel 27. Now as I don't have HD in the bedroom, only digital, I get the analog version on channel A27. But there are two other channels that show up on 27 which are D27-1 WRDQ-HD and D27-2 WRDQ. there is no way to select A27 or D27-anything and so when I enter 27, you get the channel 27 it was last on and you have to then have to page up and down to find the right "channel 27". Very confusing. If anyone knows a solution or if I have not programmed it correctly, very pleased to hear from you.

Reviews.Title: oCOSMO 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Sheila A DelVal
Reviews.Content: This TV is just perfect for a bedroom the picture is excellent and as of today I have  not tried the built in DVD player but I'm sure I'll be happy with that also

Reviews.Title: Lines and cable cord slot problems
Reviews.Author: sarah longworth
Reviews.Content: Turned it on and has lines on some channels. I can barely put the cable cord on it because the slot for the cable cord is so tiny. You get what you pay for, I guess and it was cheap.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful set for my bedroom!
Reviews.Author: David E. Solid "Solid"
Reviews.Content: beautiful set for my bedroom. My husband didn't seem to have any trouble until connecting to our cable company. We called the cable company and they told us over the phone and still didn't work correctly so they sent out a technician with a different cable box than the one the cable company had given us and that worked.  The picture is clear, sound is good and I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Had I known
Reviews.Author: elizabeth day
Reviews.Content: I would have ordered a more popular TV - took forever to hook it up and get it going - more remotes are not compatible with this make - we got it figured out but, with the control it comes with - it only controls the TV - I needed a second remote to turn on the cable and finally got one to recognize both the tv and cable - you have to push bottoms everywhere to get it to one or the other to come on.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Kara Babcock
Reviews.Content: The picture on the tv is great and the dvd player works well... I just wish the tv was bigger and the dvd player was a blue-ray.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: Ashlee Conatser
Reviews.Content: Super peeved! Purchased this television, my children put the DVD in the wrong way and can't get it out now! I called and we have to send the television back! & won't get it back for another 2-3 weeks! I am so mad! Also the sounds sucks.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleek & Slim 32" LED 720P HDTV w/ Built-in DVD
3 x HDMI Port, MHL Port, USB Port
ATSC/NTSC/Clear QAM
60 Hz Refresh Rate
Wall mountable 200 x 200 VESA Standard
ProductInfo.Name: oCOSMO 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED  HDTV with Built-in DVD Player (Glossy Black)
